price: Dan hak bagi Allah (menerangkan) jalan yang lurus dan di antara jalan-jalan ada yang bengkok.  Dan jikalau Dia menghendaki, tentulah Dia memimpin kamu semuanya (kepada jalan yang benar).
arabic: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصۡدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا جَآئِرٞۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿalā al-lahi qaṣdu al-sabīli wamin'hā jāirun walaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
translations: surely He would have guided you
